turns.text: Oh yes very appropriate I guess Uh you ready for this

turns.text: The weather is uh this time of year has actually been kind of unusual I havent expected it to be colder until you know - like weve gotten the last couple of days
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I dont know I fly for living and Ive uh - the weathers been terribly unusual every where Ive been
turns.label: h

turns.text: -- so you you you probably go everywhere --
turns.label: qy^d

turns.text: -- and have all sorts of weather I imagine its kind of an experience also trying to land and take off in the weather
Well it was around here last night Ill tell you that
turns.label: na

turns.text: Well actually Im Im Ive heard on the news that we uh will be setting record here in the State of Texas for the uh large amounts of rain and moisture weve had this year that its going to break all kind of records that were set set set back since nineteen thirty-two
turns.label: sd

turns.text: If it keeps on raining like this and I understand its supposed to rain until Saturday night
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Saturday or Sunday they were saying yeah
turns.label: sd

turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh approaches to low minimum both both times --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and Phoenix never gets that kind of weather so -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And so are you an airline pilot
turns.label: qy

turns.text: For Southwest fantastic I have brother I have brother thats pilot also with American
turns.label: b^m

turns.text: Yeah So I imagine you uh oh with all this kind of weather it uh makes it kind of dangerous for you
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Well now I wouldnt call it danger This is uh this really isnt bad stuff to fly around in This is much better than dealing with the thunderstorms in the Springtime
turns.label: ng

turns.text: Yeah the the air systems are reasonably calm We dont have uh the turbulence --
turns.label: b^m

turns.text: -- have uh little bit of chop but its not like it is in the spring time
Oh yes Well we moved actually down here from another location and its spectacular the the thunderstorms and rain storms you get in the spring time the torrents of rain
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Spectacular is the right word for them
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Spectacular is good word for them
turns.label: aa^r

turns.text: Ive never seen thunder show like Ive seen down here before in Texas
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Lights up the whole sky and even on on - actually Ive Ive seen it where theres not cloud in the sky its cloudless night and the rain isnt falling but you can see the thunder and excuse me see the lightening going horizontally across the sky --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and back and forth and what light show
-- cloud to cloud it can be real really sensational here
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Im from uh northern Utah and thats very arid climate from uh Salt Lake City area --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and theres always lot of snow In fact where I grew up we were about an hours drive from seven to uh twelve different major ski resorts and so --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- there was an awful lot of snow and because it was an arid climate the snow was always crisp powder light snow --
-- which made it fantastic for skiing and and sleigh riding and everything else
Were you near near the Park Cities area
turns.label: qy

turns.text: -- and Brighton and yes all those areas So I imagine have you skied before
Well weve skied I have not skied that area
turns.label: na

turns.text: Ive driven through it several times Uh I skied we skied California bunch when we lived out there and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and uh um and of course grew we grew up in Minnesota and we do some skiing there --
-- lot of cross country skiing there
Yeah great Well do you think this the the weather is typical for this time of the year
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well not really I you know - Minnesotas gotten just hammered with snow um the um uh - weve gotten fair amount of rain for this time of year already --
turns.label: ng

turns.text: -- and uh Ive been surprised that we havent seen more of the temperatures that weve got today you know that moved in last night
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah its been its been cold There was time though in the uh middle part of November that got really cool really really --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then it warmed right back up and I thought great --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and thats thats fun th- - yeah my wife was just listening here and she said yeah it froze in fact
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah it was it was real cold Yeah but that was very unseasonable for us down here
turns.label: b

turns.text: And uh but uh Ive really enjoyed the weather down here too because uh two years ago we were the day after Christmas able to go out in shorts and play tennis in the nice sunny weat- weather and its not as severe I should say --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- as the weather that Ive experienced up in northern Utah
Oh yeah thats thats real true Same with us from Minnesota Its its uh - in fact Ive Ive played golf on on uh New Years Day one year
turns.label: aa

turns.text: I have brother-in-law that lives in Minnesota and they say boy six months out of the year its bitter cold and --

turns.text: -- and the wind and the blowing snow and everything
Well and theyve had uh you know - usually in Minnesota they get their snow in January --
